name: Thison’s creation #1 “ A DARK PAST ”
description:
This dark fine art painting takes you on a cultural trip to the past of Ceylon. It portrays a myth about a demon called the “ Mahasona ” that would haunt passengers on lonely roads. It's also an exotic illustration of a bullock cart that was used as the sole mode of transportation in Sri Lanka.

Original concept and digital illustration by Thison Nayanake from Ceylon Metaverse. Copyright ownership is granted to token holders. Collectors can tag us on Twitter @CeylonMetaverse and/ or message us so we can grant you a letter of authenticity.
